text:
Herd immunity occurs when a large proportion of a population becomes immune to a virus. With the presence of viral variants of COVID-19, Canada must vaccinate 85-90% of the population to reach herd immunity.

https://t.co/XZCj2Ht2tu

#COVID19 #coronavirus #vaccine #HerdImmunity https://t.co/Kbx0xE6neK
